reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 978: INTERSECTIONS IN UNORGANIZED TERRITORY
reg_info.act_under: Public Transportation and Highway Improvement Act   Loi sur l’aménagement des voies publiques et des transports en commun

content.content: 1. Section 7 of the Highway Traffic Act and the regulations made thereunder do not apply in intersections of private roads with the King’s Highway in territory without municipal organization. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 978, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Section 7 of the Highway Traffic Act and the regulations made thereunder do not apply in intersections of private roads with the King’s Highway in territory without municipal organization. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 978, s. 1.
